word_mean: 喉炎：喉部炎症，伴有咽喉干燥、疼痛、声音嘶哑、咳嗽和咽下困难

sentence.Network_en: The teacher was sick with laryngitis and canceled class.

entry.def: Laryngitis is an infection of the throat in which your larynx becomes swollen and painful, making it difficult to speak.

means.word_mean: 1. inflammation of the mucous membrane of the larynx; characterized by hoarseness or loss of voice and coughing
